page.title: 08BEPI CIRCUITS
page.content: THIS IS QUITE A NEW FACTORY IN GALASHIELS.THE WORKERS MAKE PRINTED CIRCUIT BOARDS ON WHICH COMPONENTS CAN BE MOUNTED.THEY ARE USED IN ALMOST EVERY PIECE OF ELECTRONIC EQUIPMENT-TELEVISIONS,COMPUTERS, AIRCRAFT,ROCKETS AND DEFENCE SPACE PROJECTS. IN THE PLANNING DEPARTMENT THE CUSTOMER'S DRAWINGS ARE RECEIVED AND EXAMINED. BEFORE THE BOARDS ARE ACTUALLY MANUFACTURED THE FINAL DRAWINGS WITH ANY ADJUSTMENTS ARE CHECKED OUT IN ORDER TO MAKE CERTAIN THAT THE CUSTOMERS ARE SATISFIED.IT IS ONLY THEN THAT THE BOARDS ARE MADE.
